text:
[Verse]
Feet on wet ground
Splashing around
Joy we have found
No need to slow down

[Verse 2]
Clouds overhead
No words are said
Laugh without dread
In dreams we are led

[Chorus]
We are dancing in the rain
Feeling free never plain
Let the rhythm beat again
In this moment no more strain

[Verse 3]
Water’s embrace
Smiles on our face
Everything's in place
Lost in this pace

[Bridge]
Heartbeats align
Under moonshine
Midnight we find
Time to unwind

[Chorus]
We are dancing in the rain
Feeling free never plain
Let the rhythm beat again
In this moment no more strain
title: Dancing in the Rain
